message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think you'll find it very valuable. What do you think about a price of $115?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob.  How about we meet in the middle at $110?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $108. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
